Uses of Class
Tarot.Card

  • Uses of Card in Tarot

    Subclasses of Card in Tarot 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  MajorCard
    This class is a concrete implementation of the Card class it adds a cardMessage object, that is unique to Major cards
    class  MinorCard
    This class is a concrete implementation of the Card class it adds a cardDomain object, that is unique to minor cards
    class  TarotCards
    This class creates a tarot deck using the a List/ArrayList as a data structure to store all the cards .
    Methods in Tarot that return Card 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Card Tarot.getCard​(int id)  
    Methods in Tarot with parameters of type Card 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Tarot.addCard​(Card card)
